sentences.en: Although he had been treated with antibiotics, he went to the bathroom repeatedly.
sentences.cn: 虽然他已经服用了抗生素，但他还是不停地上厕所。

sentences.en: Antibiotics is effective to cure throat infection.
sentences.cn: 抗生素对治疗咽喉部感染是很有效的.

sentences.en: Antibiotics should be used to clear up the infection.
sentences.cn: 应该用抗生素消除感染。

sentences.en: Antibiotics should kill off the bacteria.
sentences.cn: 抗生素应能杀死这种细菌.

sentences.en: I have had antibiotics for my sinusitis but it doesn't seem to be clearing up.
sentences.cn: 我服用了抗生素来治疗鼻窦炎，但似乎未能根治。

sentences.en: I'm taking antibiotics for a throat infection.
sentences.cn: 因为喉部感染,我在服用抗菌素.

sentences.en: If your urine specimen shows the presence of bacteria, you'll be prescribed antibiotics.
sentences.cn: 如果你的尿样显示有细菌存在，医生会给你开抗生素。

sentences.en: It is debatable whether or not antibiotics would make any difference.
sentences.cn: 抗生素能否起到什么作用还无法定论。

sentences.en: She was on antibiotics for an eye infection that wouldn't go away.
sentences.cn: 由于眼睛感染一直不见好，她在服用抗生素。

sentences.en: The best treatment is antibiotics, preferably by injection.
sentences.cn: 最佳的治疗方法是使用抗生素, 能够注射就更好.

sentences.en: the discovery of antibiotics in the 20th century
The doctor gave me a prescription for antibiotics.
The use of antibiotics is permitted only in extremis.
sentences.cn: 只有在万不得已的情况下才允许使用抗生素。

sentences.en: This new type of infection is resistant to antibiotics.
sentences.cn: 这种新传染病对抗菌素有抗药力.

sentences.en: We must be injected with antibiotics for our protection.
sentences.cn: 为预防起见,我们都必须注射抗生素.
你的大夫可能会开抗生素。

trans.tran_cn: （用作复数）抗生素，（用作单数）抗生物质的研究，<微>抗生素，抗菌素( antibiotic的名词复数 )
trans.tran_en: Antibiotics are medical drugs used to kill bacteria and treat infections
